name: Verify that each library root folder is singleton. 7 - There should be exactly 1 row in new_code_list_folders that is named "Code List Library".
description:
If this test fails, this means that the measure library has duplicate root folders. This will essentially
brick the entire instance. The SQL selectors to get the root library folder rely on a single result.
That root library folder is how projects-service is able to navigate through the whole website.
Gateway relies on projects-service to be able to make this call. The database should immediately
be investigated if this test fails.

steps.name: When: Execute database query for library root folder

labels.name: story
labels.value: Each instance shall contain exactly one library root folder.

labels.name: suite
labels.value: Verify the database has been set up correctly.

parameters.name: arg0
parameters.value: SELECT * FROM new_code_list_folders WHERE name='Code List Library' AND parent_id IS NULL;

parameterValues: SELECT * FROM new_code_list_folders WHERE name='Code List Library' AND parent_id IS NULL;
